name: onychophora
description:
Game that mixes the mechanics of snake and a miner game.

Full solution to the puzzles in the youtube video.

Controls:

  • Press F for fullscreen!!!
    • In the HTML5 version in itch.io, click on RUN GAME, wait until the menu with the PLAY/HELP/FULLSCREEN buttons is displayed, click in the 64x64 area, then press F or click on FULLSCREEN.
  • Arrows or WASD to move the worm
  • R to retry
  • ESC to quit to main menu

Made for #LOWREZJAM 2018

Full source code at https://github.com/renato-grottesi/onychophora
